data.text: @P35418330 Please wait until after isolation has ended. We have lots of appointment and walk in options available every week, so you will be able to reschedule easily at https://t.co/zwCx48maAH
@BernieBernie2 @KFLAPH You can get 1 vaccine everyday. Stop asking questions and take your shots.
@KFLAPH 16 year old will be on day 5 of quarantine due to a positive brother.  Can she get 3rd dose while in quarantine?
@KFLAPH What about dose number 4, how long do I have to wait after dose 3?
@KFLAPH How about commenting on the rising infections in KFLA for residents?
